name: npm-bin-deps
description: run cli dev deps with npr

scripts.vendor: npm run vendor:lockfile && npm run vendor:rimraf && npm run vendor:signal-exit
scripts.vendor:rimraf: cp node_modules/rimraf/rimraf.js rimraf.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from rimraf@3.0.2.\n;' rimraf.js;
scripts.vendor:lockfile: cp node_modules/lockfile/lockfile.js lockfile.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from lockfile@1.0.4.\n;' lockfile.js; sed -i 's#require(\x27signal-exit\x27)#require(\x27./signal-exit.js\x27)#' lockfile.js
scripts.vendor:signal-exit: cp node_modules/signal-exit/index.js signal-exit.js; cp node_modules/signal-exit/signals.js signals.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from signal-exit@3.0.3.\n;' signal-exit.js;

author: Raynos
